mapper.select: select schedule_no as scheduleNo, schedule_start as scheduleStart, schedule_end as scheduleEnd, movie_title as movieTitle, theater_branch as theaterBranch from schedule_tbl where to_char(schedule_start, 'dd/mm/yyyy') = #{_parameter}

select schedule_no as scheduleNo, schedule_start as scheduleStart, schedule_end as scheduleEnd, movie_title as movieTitle, theater_branch as theaterBranch from schedule_tbl
where theater_branch = #{_parameter}

select schedule_no as scheduleNo from schedule_tbl where to_char(schedule_start, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') = #{startOutput} and to_char(schedule_end, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') = #{endOutput} and movie_title = #{title} and theater_branch = #{branch}
mapper.insert: insert into schedule_tbl values (schedule_tbl_seq.nextval, to_date(#{startOutput}, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), to_date(#{endOutput}, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), #{title}, #{branch})
